Name: Sylvain Leroux
AboutMe:
I'm currently looking for a position as software developer. My primary domain of activity are databases and Python at this time. But I've solid knowledge on many other technologies: C++, Java, digital electronics & embedded systems just to name few.

I think, my major strength is my ability to understand new technologies and use them at their best. And I like doing things "well". I spend the last few years teaching IT & electronics at students of all ages, from young teenagers to graduated students. So not only I'm able to adapt myself to evolving technologies, but I'm also very efficient at sharing my knowledge.

I live in France, near Lorient with my wife and our one year old son. And I would be primary interested for a job in that area or for a job allowing to work remotely.
